hello! this is the **ChatGPT Daily Brief (CDB)** archive: an open-source intelligence digest compiled and rendered by ChatGPT 5 each morning for geopolitical news. I originally created this product for personal use so I could receive a summarized update of the day's main issues without having to read multiple different newsletters. Adding it here in case folks find it useful.

Click any date below to view that dayâ€™s brief.


```{python}
#| output: asis
import os
from pathlib import Path
import datetime

def find_cdb_dir():
    qproj = os.getenv("QUARTO_PROJECT_DIR")
    if qproj:
        p = Path(qproj) / "cdb"
        if p.is_dir():
            return p
    cwd = Path.cwd()
    if cwd.name.lower() == "cdb":
        return cwd
    p = cwd / "cdb"
    if p.is_dir():
        return p
    for candidate in cwd.glob("**/cdb"):
        if any(candidate.glob("CDB_*.qmd")):
            return candidate
    raise FileNotFoundError("Could not locate the 'cdb' folder.")

cdb_dir = find_cdb_dir()

files = sorted(
    [f for f in cdb_dir.glob("CDB_*.qmd") if f.is_file()],
    reverse=True
)

if not files:
    print("No briefs available yet.")
else:
    print("| Date | Link |")
    print("|------|------|")
    for f in files:
        date_str = f.stem.replace("CDB_", "")
        display = datetime.datetime.strptime(date_str, "%Y-%m-%d").strftime("%b %d, %Y")
        rel_link = f.name.replace(".qmd", ".html")
        print(f"| {display} | [View Brief]({rel_link}) |")

```
